name: Invasion! Date with the tentacles
description:
Spring , pears bloom in the school garden and you, a beautiful young lady , are full of dreams and hopes. Postpone all your plans and go to a sudden meeting with one of three squids : Plam , Chinko  or Parsek!

The game is not recommended for underaged  players.

The game has 12 endings, but only one of them is true. Go through the endings and open the gallery with pictures!

1 . 5- 2 hours for a full playthrough!

 In some scenes, the red color flashes, so please be careful if you are sensitive to flashing colors. 

There are scenes of light eroticism without nudity.

Squids are not boys or girls, so that the game will suit almost everyone.

<About the authors of the creative association blue-ink>

 B. Bera Blue-ink is the author of the text and the artist. (Patreon)

 Alexander Mezyelovyh is the composer. 

Martyn Kapustin is our irreplaceable coder and part-time guardian of order in the community and in the comments.

Thank you for playing our game!

 

As a sign of our appreciation we`ve translated in english all episodes of our web-comics «Invasion! Date with tentacles» and also added some artworks & 2 wallpapers. 

Please keep in mind that we are not native english speakers so some spelling and grammar errors may be present. You can contact us via mail blue-ink@mail.ru and we will do our best to fix them as well as any other bugs.

          Thank you for your support!
